程序包 org.apache.shardingsphere.transaction.spi

接口 ShardingSphereTransactionManager

  • 所有超级接口:
    AutoCloseable
    public interface ShardingSphereTransactionManager
extends AutoCloseable
    ShardingSphere transaction manager.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明

      Begin transaction.

      Begin transaction with given timeout.

      Commit transaction.

      Judge whether contains the provider type.

      Get transactional connection.
      TransactionType getTransactionType()
      Get transaction type.

      Initialize transaction manager.

      Judge is in transaction or not.

      Rollback transaction.

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        void init​(Map<String,​DatabaseType> databaseTypes,
          Map<String,​DataSource> dataSources,
          String providerType)
        Initialize transaction manager.
        参数:
        databaseTypes - database types
        dataSources - data sources
        providerType - transaction manager provider type

      • getTransactionType

        TransactionType getTransactionType()
        Get transaction type.
        返回:
        transaction type

      • isInTransaction

        boolean isInTransaction()
        Judge is in transaction or not.
        返回:
        in transaction or not

      • getConnection

        Connection getConnection​(String databaseName,
                         String dataSourceName)
                  throws SQLException
        Get transactional connection.
        参数:
        databaseName - database name
        dataSourceName - data source name
        返回:
        connection
        抛出:
        SQLException - SQL exception

      • begin

        void begin()
        Begin transaction.

      • begin

        void begin​(int timeout)
        Begin transaction with given timeout.
        参数:
        timeout - Transaction timeout in SECONDS

      • commit

        void commit​(boolean rollbackOnly)
        Commit transaction.
        参数:
        rollbackOnly - rollback only

      • rollback

        void rollback()
        Rollback transaction.

      • containsProviderType

        default boolean containsProviderType​(String providerType)
        Judge whether contains the provider type.
        参数:
        providerType - transaction manager provider type
        返回:
        contains provider type or not
